    Subclasses of Entity in entities.mobs
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Boss
    The Boss class represent a Boss enemy with the properties of Enemy
    class  Enemy
    The Enemy class represents an enemy with all the properties of the Entity class
    class  Goon
    The class Goon class represents an Enemy
    class  Player
    The Player class represents the two users in the program that interact with the entities

  • Uses of Entity in entities.projectiles

    Subclasses of Entity in entities.projectiles
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Bullet
    This class represents a Bullet with the properties of Prjectile
    class  Coin
    this class represents a coin, which can be picked up.
    class  PowerUp
    This class is a powerup, which buffs the player
    class  Projectile
    This class is a Projectile, which collides with Entity and damages them
    class  Trap
    This is a trap, which can be deployed by players.
    class  Wind
    this class represents wind, which pushes a player back.
    Methods in entities.projectiles with parameters of type Entity
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Projectile.interact​(Entity e)
    Causes the Entity hit by the Bullet to lose HP
    void Trap.interact​(Entity e)
    Determines the type of Trap and applies the effects on the specified Entity
